name: Voxel Drivers
description:
In this game, you need win races to unlock the other races. In this way, every race will give you more fun. The map is big and fantastic. You need to drive carefully to not drop down. If you drop down, you will eliminated. Be the best driver of this world!


Use your speed to pass your opponents. The map is hard and you musn't drop down. If you fall, the race will over. By using your speed and driver abilities you can always be the winner and finish the all races. Also you'll need to slow down sometimes. Don't trust the power of your car.


  • 4 Opponent and 4 Driveable Cars.
  • Big & Funny A Map
  • Low-Poly Graphics and Good Quality.
  • 4 Races need to be unlocked by winning races.
